verses.content: Chun, in kawtkhâra chun a mi ṭhuoi kîr nâwk a; chun, ngai ta, in tuolpûk saktieng panga chun tui hi a suok a, (chu in hmai chu saktieng ngha a ni sih a); chun, tui chu a hnuoia inthawk chun, in changtieng pangah, mâichâm simtieng panga inthawk chun a hung luong thla a.

Chun, hmârtienga dâi kawtkhâr lampuia chun a mi ṭhuoi suok tah a; dâi kawtkhâr saktieng ngha lam- puiah, dâi kawtkhâr puo lem lampuia chun a mi ṭhuoi vêl a; chun, ngai ta, chu changtieng panga chun tui chu a hung luong suok a.
Mi a kuta thil tluon chawia sak- tienga fe peia inkhiin, tawng sâng khat ân khi a, kemit chen tlum tui chu a mîn fekaitir a.
Chun, tawng sâng ân khi nâwk a, tui khûp tlumah, tui chu a mîn fe- kaitir nâwk a. Chun, sâng ma ân khi nâwk a, tui kâwng tlumah, tui chu a mîn fekaitir nâwk a.
Chu hnunga chun sâng ân khi nâwk a, vadungpui a hung ni tah a, ka fethleng thei ta nawh a; tui chu a hung insâng a, vadungpui kai thei- lo hiel, inhlieuna khawp a hung ni tah a.
Chun, ama chun ka kuomah, “Mihriem naupa, hi hi i hmu am?” a tih a. Chun, a mi ṭhuoi a, vadungpui kamah a mîn kîrtir nâwk tah a.
Chun, chuonga ka kîr lai chun, ngai ta, vadungpui kama chun hi tieng sîr le khing tieng sîra khawm chun thing tamtak an um a.

Chun, ama chun ka kuomah, “Hieng tuihai hi saktieng rama in- thawka hung suok an na, Arabaa chun fe thlâng an ta; chun, tuisuoriet tieng fe pei an ta, tuipui tui al chu tui inthiengah inchangtir an tih.

Chun, thilhring tinrêng vadung- puihai fena tieng tienga hung in- khâwmhai chu hring an tih; chun, nga tamtak el hung um an ta; chuong- chun, vadungpui luongna phawta tuipui tuihai ân thiengna ding le thil tinrênghai an hring theina dinga hung luong an nih.

Chun, nga mantuhai chu a sîra chun ngîr an ta, En-gedia inthawka En-eglaim chenin lênhai dêngna hmun a ni ding a nih; an ngahai chu chi tum tum, tuisuoriet lientak nga- hai angin a tama tam nîng an tih.
Amiruokchu, chutaka dûm hmunhai le dieldâwk hmunhai chu sukthieng ni naw ni hai a, chi dinga mâksan ni lem an tih.

Chun, vadungpui pang sîra chun hi tienga le khingtieng sîra khawm bua ring dingin thinghai ṭo an ta; an hna vuoi ngai naw ni a; an ra khawm hrût ngai bawk naw nih; thla kipin ra thar hung insuong an ta, an ta dingin tuihai hmun inthienga inthawka a hung luong zing leiin; an rahai chu bua ring ding nîng a ta, an hnahai chu sukdamna ding nîng an tih,” a ta.
Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: “Israel hnam sâwmpahni ang peia rochan dinga ram chu i semna ding, ramri chu hi hi nîng a tih: Josef khawma chan hni a nei ding a nih.
Chun, hluong in ta, inang seng- in; chu dinga in thlatuhai kuoma pe dinga ka bân ka lo phar tah, hi ram hi in ta dinga rochan dingin a tlu ding a nih.
Hi hi hmârtienga ramri chu nîng a tih; tuisuoriet liena inthawka Hethlon lampui zuiin, Zedad lûtna chenin;
Hamath le, Berotha dâm, Si- braim dâm, chu chu Damaska ramri le Hamath ramri inkâra chun a um a; Hazer-hattikon chu Hauran ramri sîra chun a um bawk a.
Chun, tuisuorieta inthawka ramri chu Damaska ramria Hazar- enon ramri kha ning a ta; chun hmârtieng chun hmâr khawin Hemath ramri chu a um. Hi hi hmârtieng pang a nih.

Saktieng panga chun, Hauran le Damaska le Gilead le Israel ram inkâra chun, Jordan chu um a ta; hmârtieng ramria inthawk chun saktieng tuisuoriet chen chu inkhi ding a nih. Hi hi saktieng chu nîng a tih.
Chun, simtienga sim khâw zâwnga chun, Tamara inthawka Meriboth-kades tuihai chen le, Aigupta vadungtê hrawin, tuisuoriet lienah. Hi hi sim tienga, sim khâw zâwng chu a nih.
Thlangtienga chun tuisuoriet lien nîng a ta, simtieng ramria in- thawka Hamath hang lûtna ep chen khan. Hi hi thlangtieng pang chu nîng a tih.
Chuongchun, ram chu Israel hnam ang peiin nangni lai chun insem in tih.

Chun, in ta dinga rochan ding le, nangni laia pêm mikhuol um vehai hi hnunga thlahai la nei dinghai ta ding chun aisânin sem in ta; Israel thlahai laia chun anni chu in ina pieng ang bawk nîng an tih; Israel hnam nangni laia chun rochan chu an chang ve ding a nih.
Chun, chu pêm chu a tu hnama khawm lo mikhuol sien, chu hnama chun ama chu a rochan chu pêk nîng a tih, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih.
